thread.title: 11 actually cool matching tattoos that you can get with your boo
thread.title_full: 11 actually cool matching tattoos that you can get with your boo

author: Caitlin Flynn
title: 11 actually cool matching tattoos that you can get with your boo
text:
11 actually cool matching tattoos that you can get with your boo If you just realized that Valentine’s Day is upon us and every romantic date spot in town is booked solid, don’t fret — why not try something a little different this year? If you and your partner are both cool with getting inked, there’s no time like the present to get matching tattoos with your significant other on Valentine’s Day .
Don’t worry, we’re not suggesting anything cheesy (and potentially super awkward in the unfortunate event of a breakup) like getting each other’s names tattooed on yourselves for all eternity.
But there are plenty of options that are both meaningful as a couple’s tattoos and beautiful as a solo tattoo. Need some ideas? We’ve got you covered.
1. Planet & rocket Cute#planet and #rocket #tattoo for cute new clients #redondobeachtattooshop #makelucktattoo #davidnelson #armtattoo #coupletattoos 
A photo posted by Make Luck Tattoo (@makelucktattoo) on Feb 11, 2017 at 1:16pm PST 
The planet and rocket tattoo is perfect for couples who share a love of all things celestial.
2. The Grateful Dead dancing bear Baby got us matching tattoos. ✌ #dancingbears #goodvibes #goodvibesonly #peace #love #gratefuldead #gratefuldeadtattoo #coupletattoos #hisandherstattoos #hippylove #trippyhippy #jerrygarcia #deadhead #deadheads #shakedownstreet #mississippihalfstep #browneyedwomen #music #livefree 
A photo posted by Jade Alyxandra (@dwn_the_rabbithole) on Feb 8, 2017 at 2:19pm PST 
If you and your significant other bonded over your love of one of the best rock bands of all time, why not get matching dancing bears?
3. Anchor and wheel Guide me in your truth Anchor me in your love #youandme #anchor #wheel #tattoo #coupletattoos #lovetattoos #lovemarks 
A photo posted by Sam Kwan (@kwanilicious) on Jan 29, 2017 at 6:55am PST 
This is a beautiful way to express the sentiment, “guide me in your truth and anchor me in your love.”
4. Lucky in love Lucky in love... @jesstime___ @tattooaddictsouthafrica #ink#love#couples#coupletattoos#life#clover#lucky#black#happy#life#beautiful#instagood#art#tattoo#tattoos#tattooed#inked#tattooartist 
A photo posted by Roxy J (@foxtini_tattoo) on Jan 22, 2017 at 10:43pm PST 
These simple four-leaf clover tattoos are a subtle way to express your gratitude for that special someone.
5. Move forward Move foward ➡️➡️ #firsttattoo #minitattoo #coupletattoos #arrow 
A photo posted by Quang Minh (@liit.minh) on Jan 22, 2017 at 2:08am PST 
Can’t wait for what the future has in store for you and your significant other? Get inked with these matching arrows.
6. Hearts Hi I'm back #transboy #transgender #femaletomale #feelinghappy #blackandwhite #blueeyes #chokers #emoboy #emo #grunge #blondie #tattoos #coupletattoos 
A photo posted by mellø frends (@mickeydecay) on Jan 21, 2017 at 7:51am PST 
These edgy tattoos prove that matching heart tattoos definitely don’t have to be saccharine.
7. Bow and arrow Couple tattoos ️ #coupletattoo #coupletattoos #bowandarrow #bowandarrowtattoo 
A photo posted by Ge Zhang (@gezhangart) on Jan 14, 2017 at 9:54am PST 
Cupid struck you both with his arrow, and these bow and arrow tattoos complement each other perfectly.
8. Chess pieces Grants is a black king chess piece, mine is a white queen. We will protect and defend each other, we will have our battles and we will have our fights but in the end we will remain in love. We will always be in control and in power of our separate lives, but we are better together. #coupletattoos #kingandqueen #bettertogether #tattoos #love @uhh_grant 
A photo posted by Brooke Dzwonkiewicz (@brookelikewoah) on Jan 13, 2017 at 9:54pm PST 
We love the sentiment behind these tattoos — each member of the couple is strong and independent, but they’ll protect and defend one another.
9. King and queen ❤ #powercouple #kingandqueen #coupletattoos #tattedcouples #kingandqueentattoo #crowntattoo #love #myking #hisqueen 
A photo posted by CJ Zye (@x_zenzye_x) on Jan 6, 2017 at 6:14pm PST 
Perfect for the ultimate power couple.
10. Mountains A pair of couple tattoos from @losttimetattoo This tattoo was sponsored by @shaunhubbardtattoo thanks for the support man, I wouldn't be tattooing without you! (Literally) #coupletattoos #dotwork #dotworktattoo #moutaintattoo #scenerytattoo #blackworkerssubmissions #blxckink #blacktattoos #blacktattooart #blacktattoomag #onlyblackart #blacktattooing 
A photo posted by Danny 'Leslie' Charles (@truegenttattoos) on Jan 6, 2017 at 6:17am PST 
If you and your significant are outdoorsy (or you just love a good view), these mountain tattoos are seriously stunning. Plus, as The Proclaimers once sang, love can move mountains.
11. Gazelle couple cute gazelles for a cute couple! #blackwork #dotwork #blacktattoo #torontotattoo #darkartists #matchingtattoos 
A photo posted by yi (@postyism) on Dec 21, 2016 at 11:52am PST 
There’s nothing cuter than an animal couple, am I right? If these adorable gazelles don’t strike your fancy, there are plenty of other animal duos that make great couple tattoos.
So, if you’re bored with dinner, a movie, and a box of chocolates, head to a tattoo parlor and express your love and devotion by getting inked.
